TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ControlExtensions extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供扩展方法，它可用于向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具自定义的 Excel 工作表添加 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: Provides extension methods you can use to add Windows Forms controls to Excel worksheets that have been customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在运行时由属性 (在应用程序级项目中) 或属性 (在文档级项目中) 返回的对象上可用的扩展方法。 The methods are extension methods that are available on the object returned by the property (in an application-level project) or the property (in a document-level project) at run time. 若要将特定控件添加到文档中, 请使用方法, 该方法在方法名称中包含控件的名称。To add a specific control to a document, use the method that includes the name of the control in the method name. 例如, 若要添加, 请使用方法。For example, to add a , use the method. 有关文档控件的详细信息, 请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information about controls to a document, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). 有关扩展方法的详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51)和[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6)。For more information about extension methods, see [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51) and [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6). > [!NOTE] > 在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 外接程序项目中, 必须先添加对 "" 的引用, 然后才能访问方法, 然后才能访问。In Excel add-in projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], you must add a reference to the Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.v4.0.Utilities.dll assembly before you can access the methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将控件添加到单元格**A1**, 然后向该按钮添加文本。The following code example uses the method to add a control to cell **A1**, and then adds text to the button. 若要使用此示例, 请在文档`Sheet1`级项目的类中运行它。To use this example, run it from the `Sheet1` class in a document-level project.
